title: Absolute Cinematic Masterpiece
review: When I competes my first viewing of us this film I was shocked! I had never seen a movie so perfect and having a ton of replay value. I think I watched it again the same day if not the next. Bladerunner 2049 has everything you need in a great science fiction movie. Ridley scott and Dennis V teamed up on a hell of a project and I do not believe this movie could be any better. This is one of my favorite movies of all time.
